isis.stitle: AIR CONDITIONING - HEATER SYSTEM: 2000, 4000, AND 8000 - 12/06/1994 and After - OPERATION

svcsubsecinfo.para: The operation of the Blend-Air system is based on standard automotive heating and air conditioning principles.

svcproc.title: FRESH AIR VENTILATION
svcproc.para: Fresh air enters the cab through the heater system. Adjust the TEMPERATURE CONTROL knob ( Figure 2) as required to give the desired degree of ventilation. The full counterclockwise (blue) position provides the maximum ventilation. Move the AIR OUTLET knob to whichever position provides the desired air flow distribution.
The fan may be used to increase the amount of air entering the cab during ventilation. Adjust the fan speed as desired. All heater and heater-A/C systems have four dash registers.
